t: I stood alone in the dim light of my kitchen. The last olive slid down my throat, a briny disappointment. I had devoured every food item in the fridge, yet it was not enough. I clutched my empty stomach, the gnawing emptiness echoing the hollowness of the fridge. I looked down, my eyes falling on my hand. It was pale and veined against the dim light from the fridge. Slowly, almost mechanically, I brought it up to my mouth.
c:
There was still some sauce on my fingers to lick.



#hunger #cannibalism #emptiness #horror #craving #desperate #solitude #unsettling
